title: Air Fryer Hard-Boiled Eggs Recipe
description: Hard-boiled eggs in the air fryer? That's right, no boiling water is needed for these hard-cooked eggs with perfect yolks ready in just 15 minutes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Everyday Cooking Cooking by Equipment Air Fryer Air Fryer Hard-Boiled Eggs 4.6 (108) 98 Reviews 11 Photos Easy air fryer hard-boiled eggs with perfect yolks in just 15 minutes. I love not having to wait for the water to boil and not having to wash the pot! Submitted by Yoly Updated on March 21, 2025 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 11 11 11 11 Cook Time: 15 mins Additional Time: 10 mins Total Time: 25 mins Servings: 6 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 6 large eggs, room temperature Directions Preheat an air fryer to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Place eggs in the air fryer basket. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook eggs in the preheated air fryer for 15 minutes. Transfer eggs to a cold water bath until fully cooled, 8 to 10 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 246 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Air Fryer Hard-Boiled Eggs 01 of 11 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 11 Photo by  wgregory 01/03/2024 Not quite cooked all the way thru the first time. I may increase the temp next time or forego the water bath. 03 of 11 Photo by  SpryKnife1929 09/23/2023 I was skeptical at first but it worked so well for me! I threw them in the freezer in water after air frying and worked just the same. 04 of 11 Photo by  ClassyStir4652 07/29/2023 Thank you for this recipe. It was so easy especially since I toasted my bread before I made this so it cut down on cooking time bc my air fryer was already reheated. 05 of 11 Photo by  PeppySalt9172 09/08/2022 This was exactly as easy as it stated. The only change I made was that I let the eggs sit on the counter 20 minutes before hand so they would be room temperature (Ish) ! Although they don't look hard cooked, I ate all three eggs and my my my how good they were. Thank you for this recipe! I am new to air frying and have an inexpensive small one, yet it worked just the same. I will try to upload a picture. 06 of 11 Photo by  Misty Rose 04/03/2021 07 of 11 Photo by  Amber Taylor 05/01/2020 08 of 11 Photo by  Candy Roach 02/26/2020 I had doubts but followed the instructions exactly as stated. Eggs turned out amazing. Tried it again and added an additional minute. Second time they were even better. Love that I don't have to wait for water to boil. I even accidently cracked a triangle in the shell on one egg and placed the eggshell back on the egg and baked it anyhow and it came out perfectly. 09 of 11 Photo by  nak 02/25/2020 It worked very well. I put the eggs in an ice bath for about 10 minutes after they were done. They peeled easily and neatly. It exceeded my expectations. 10 of 11 Photo by  tvsp 02/20/2020 just made 2 to check and found i'll need another 5 minutes for the yolks. awesome to be able to do this though!! 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Air Fryer Boursin-Stuffed Wontons 2 Ratings Air Fryer Ranch-Stuffed Olives 1 Rating Guilt-Free Air Fryer Ranch Zucchini Chips 10 Ratings Air-Fried Cajun Polenta Fries 2 Ratings "Everything" Seasoning Air Fryer Asparagus 2 Ratings Air Fryer Souffle Egg Cups 3 Ratings Air Fryer Apple Chips 4 Ratings Air Fryer Mini Bean and Cheese Tacos 1 Rating Air Fryer Asian-Inspired Deviled Eggs 5 Ratings Air Fryer Spinach-Feta Frittata 1 Rating Air Fryer Tofu Milanesa 1 Rating Keto Air Fryer Jalapeño Poppers 15 Ratings Air Fryer Potato Chips 14 Ratings Sweet Potato Chips in the Air Fryer 6 Ratings Air Fryer Plantain Chips 9 Ratings Air Fryer Salt and Vinegar Potato Chips 2 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Yoly
instructions: Preheat an air fryer to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C). Place eggs in the air fryer basket. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios;Cook eggs in the preheated air fryer for 15 minutes. Transfer eggs to a cold water bath until fully cooled, 8 to 10 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios
